text:
Today,
Bourelly Service is a company
that works in two major areas,
such as healthcare logistics,
or patient transport,

healthcare within public
and private facilities,

and the whole area
of roadside service and assistance.

It operates firmly
within the region of Naples,

the province of Caserta, Rome
and now, in a few months,

we will begin focusing
on the province of Milan.

The cloud helped us guarantee
to the Public Administration,

and users that benefited
from our services,

especially the privacy
of the management of healthcare data
and then a lot of reporting,

and operating time rationalization
by staff members.
And then, how can I say it,

we are keeping abreast
of every operation
that we carried out on a daily basis.

The company we turned to,
the company Epsilon,

basically allowed us
to immediately resolve

the needs we had
as healthcare professionals,

but, above all, the needs
of the client, which was the Ministry.

And I have to say that this company
has allowed us, in a very short time,
in a matter of 40 or 45 days,
to quickly draft up a pilot project

to be presented
to the Ministry, and even

make it operational
in a matter of 10 days.
